name: Break Out (of Control)
description:
Made in 48 hours for the 2020 Game Maker's Toolkit Jam!

For the theme of "out of control" I decided to create a bonkers Breakout game! The aim is to break all the white blocks, which release more balls - more balls = more mayhem! You can also activate bullet time to try and take back control.

There are 9 levels in the game. Can you beat them all?
